titleStmt.title: A discourse concerninge the Spanishe fleete inuadinge Englande in the yeare 1588 and ouerthrowne by Her Ma[ies]ties nauie vnder the conduction of the Right-honorable the Lorde Charles Howarde highe Admirall of Englande: written in Italian by Petruccio Vbaldino cicizen of Florence, and translated for A. Ryther: vnto the w[hi]ch discourse are annexed certaine tables expressinge the seuerall exploites, and conflictes had with the said fleete. These bookes with the tables belonginge to them are to be solde at the shoppe of A. Ryther beinge a little from Leaden hall next to the signe of the Tower.
titleStmt.author: Ubaldini, Petruccio, 1524?-1600?

publicationStmt.publisher: By A. Hatfield, and are to be sold at the shop of A. Rither, being a little from Leaden hall next to the signe of the Tower,

notesStmt.note: The tables, i.e. engravings, were issued separately as "Expeditionis Hispanorum in Angliam vera descriptio anno Do: MDLXXXVIII" (STC 24481a).
The Italian text was evidently unpublished.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: the shop of A. Rither, being a little from Leaden hall next to the signe of the Tower
